original_text: And the priest shall take some of the log of oil, and pour it into the palm of his own left hand:
korean_text: 제사장은 또 그 한 록의 기름을 취하여 자기 왼쪽 손바닥에 따르고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall take some of the log of oil,
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 기름 통 중에서 얼마를 가져와서

sentences.original_text: and pour it into the palm of his own left hand:
